product_description: Australian Made Resilient Homogenous Vinyl flooring
recyclable_percentage_description: Armstrong Vinyl products can be taken back and recycled at Armstrongs Australian manufacturing plant
recyclable_offcuts_description: Offcuts can be returned to Armstrong to be recycled.
recycling_process_description: Post Consumer vinyl can be palletised and recycled for use in the manufacturing of new Armstrong products
end_of_life_program_description: Armstrong Flooring manufactures its products in Australia and uses its facilities to take back used material to be reworked and recycled into new Vinyl flooring. Armstrong Flooring is also a founding member of the ResiLoop Program based in Australia.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Trucks are run at 85% full loads and Backloading is utilised where possible
minimisation_design_strategy: Sheet vinyl should be set out in a way that allows for the highest yield of the material required.
specific_installation_methods: Product to be cleanly uplifted for recycling.
other_comments: Armstrong flooring is proud to be Australia's only vinyl flooring manufacturer. Specify Armstrong Flooring to support local content through use of Australian made products.
type_of_packaging: Reusable timber pallets, paper wrapping, strapping and pallet wrap.
